article.title: Battlespace to Provide MQ-1 Operation and Maintenance
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Battlespace Flight Services LLC, Arlington, Va., is being awarded a $13,740,356 contract modification for MQ-1 O-level operation and maintenance services. The contracting activity is Air Combat Command Acquisition Management and Innovation Center, Langley Air Force Base, Va.
